author: IoT Device Management Platform Security Team

statements.impact_statement: MQTT authentication bypass. KEV-listed. Critical for device connectivity. 500K+ devices affected. Safety-critical operations at risk.
statements.action_statement: EMERGENCY: Upgrade to mosquitto@2.0.19. Deploy within 4 hours per KEV directive. Implement temporary IP allowlist.

statements.impact_statement: HTTP/2 rapid reset DoS. KEV-listed. All gRPC services affected. Could cause device control outage.
statements.action_statement: URGENT: Upgrade to net@0.19.0. Deploy within 24 hours per KEV directive.

statements.impact_statement: InfluxDB authentication bypass. KEV-listed. Telemetry database affected. Could expose device operational data.
statements.action_statement: URGENT: Upgrade to influxdb@2.7.5. Deploy within 24 hours per KEV directive.

statements.impact_statement: Privilege escalation in etcd. Device registry affected. Could allow unauthorized device registration or configuration changes.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to etcd@3.5.11. Review RBAC policies. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: DoS in gRPC HTTP/2. All API services affected. Could cause service outage impacting device control.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to grpc-go@1.60.0. Test gRPC endpoints. Deploy within 72 hours.

statements.impact_statement: SQL injection in PostgreSQL driver. Metadata database affected. Could expose device configurations.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to pq@1.10.10. Review all database queries. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: JWT bypass vulnerability. We use X.509 certificates for device authentication, not JWT. Vulnerability does not apply.
Timing attack in RSA. Used for certificate operations. Low exploitability but should be patched.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to crypto@0.16.0. Deploy during next maintenance window.

statements.impact_statement: Container escape in K3s. Edge gateways use K3s but with strict pod security policies and no untrusted workloads. Risk mitigated.
statements.action_statement: Update during next edge gateway maintenance cycle. Low priority.

statements.impact_statement: Local privilege escalation in Alpine. Container images are immutable and apk is not used at runtime. Not exploitable.
statements.action_statement: Update base images during next rebuild. Low priority.
